item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260210)
item.description:
What's New

feat: replace axDirect with emptyCharPrefix for Firefox input

  • Add needsEmptyCharPrefix flag to InjectionMethodInfo struct
  • Switch Firefox address bar and AX degraded fallback from .axDirect

to .fast method with emptyCharPrefix enabled

  • Implement emptyCharPrefix injection: sends U+202F (Narrow No-Break

Space) before backspaces to break Firefox autocomplete suggestions

  • Add useDirectPost parameter to sendEmptyCharacter() for reliable

delivery via cgSessionEventTap

  • Show [EmptyCharPrefix] indicator in debug logs
  • Bump build number to 20260210

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
